Question
========
True or false? If an object is at rest, then there are no forces acting upon the object.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False


Solution
========
False. If an object is at rest, then the forces on it must be balanced. For example, a book at rest on a table is acted upon by gravity and the normal force from the desk.
